author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour Weekend full episode October 25, 2015 PBS NewsHour
text: On this edition for Sunday, October 25th, 2015, rain-soaked Texas contends with flash floods, President Obama wants American school kids to spend less time preparing for standardized tests, and the president of Honduras talks about the country's surge of domestic violence. William Brangham anchors from New York.
